verses.title: Verse 1
verses.text:
Namo tassa bhagavato arahato
sammāsaṃbuddhassa
Namo tassa bhagavato arahato
sammāsaṃbuddhassa
Namo tassa bhagavato arahato
sammāsaṃbuddhassa

verses.title: Verse 2
verses.text:
Iti'pi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammā-sambuddho
vijjā-carana sampanno sugato
loka-vidū, anuttaro purisa-dhamma-sāratī
satthā deva-manussānaṃ
buddho bhagavā ti

verses.title: Verse 3
verses.text:
Buddham jīvita-pariyantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi
Ye ca Buddhā atītā ca
Ye ca Buddhā anāgatā
Paccuppannā ca ye Buddhā
Ahaṃ vandāmi sabbadā
N'atthi me saraṇaṃ aññaṃ
Buddho me saraṇaṃ varaṃ
Etena sacca-vajjena
Hotu me jaya-maṅgalaṃ

verses.title: Verse 4
verses.text:
Svākkhāto bhagavatā Dhammo
sandiṭṭhiko akāliko
ehipassiko
opanayiko paccataṃ
veditabbo viññūhī 'ti

verses.title: Verse 5
verses.text:
Dhammaṃ jīvita-pariyantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi
Ye ca Dhammā atītā ca
Ye ca Dhammā anāgatā
Paccuppannā ca ye Dhammā
Ahaṃ vandāmi sabbadā
N'atthi me saraṇaṃ aññaṃ
Dhammo me saraṇaṃ varaṃ
Etena sacca-vajjena
Hotu me jaya-maṅgalaṃ

verses.title: Verse 6
verses.text:
Supaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho
ujupatipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho
ñāyapaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho
sāmīcipaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho

verses.title: Verse 7
verses.text:
yadidaṃ cattāri purisayugāni
aṭṭha purisapuggalā
Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho
āhuneyyo, pāhuneyyo, dakkhineyyo
añjalikaranīyo anuttaraṃ
puññakkhettam lokassā 'ti

verses.title: Verse 8
verses.text:
Saṅghaṃ jīvita-pariyantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi
Ye ca Saṅghā atītā ca
Ye ca Saṅghā anāgatā
Paccuppannā ca ye Saṅghā
Ahaṃ vandāmi sabbadā
N'atthi me saraṇaṃ aññaṃ
Saṅgho me saraṇaṃ varaṃ
Etena sacca-vajjena
Hotu me jaya-maṅgalaṃ

verses.title: Verse 1
verses.text:
The Bodhisattva of Compassion,
When he meditated deeply,
Saw the emptiness of all five skandhas
And sundered the bonds that caused him suffering.

verses.title: Verse 2
verses.text:
Here then,
Form is no other than emptiness,
Emptiness no other than form.
Form is only emptiness,
Emptiness only form.

verses.title: Verse 3
verses.text:
Feeling, thought, and choice,
Consciousness itself,
Are the same as this.

verses.title: Verse 4
verses.text:
All things are by nature void
They are not born or destroyed
Nor are they stained or pure
Nor do they wax or wane

verses.title: Verse 5
verses.text:
So, in emptiness, no form,
No feeling, thought, or choice,
Nor is there consciousness.
No eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, mind;
No colour, sound, smell, taste, touch,
Or what the mind takes hold of,
Nor even act of sensing.

verses.title: Verse 6
verses.text:
No ignorance or end of it,
Nor all that comes of ignorance;
No withering, no death,
No end of them.

verses.title: Verse 7
verses.text:
Nor is there pain, or cause of pain,
Or cease in pain, or noble path
To lead from pain;
Not even wisdom to attain!
Attainment too is emptiness.

verses.title: Verse 8
verses.text:
So know that the Bodhisattva
Holding to nothing whatever,
But dwelling in Prajna wisdom,
Is freed of delusive hindrance,
Rid of the fear bred by it,
And reaches clearest Nirvana.

verses.title: Verse 9
verses.text:
All Buddhas of past and present,
Buddhas of future time,
Using this Prajna wisdom,
Come to full and perfect vision.

verses.title: Verse 10
verses.text:
Hear then the great dharani,
The radiant peerless mantra,
The Prajnaparamita
Whose words allay all pain;
Hear and believe its truth!

verses.title: Verse 11
verses.text:
Gate Gate Paragate Parasamgate Bodhi Svaha
Gate Gate Paragate Parasamgate Bodhi Svaha
Gate Gate Paragate Parasamgate Bodhi Svaha

verses.title: Dhp 183
verses.text:
Sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṁ,
kusalassa upasampadā,
sacittapariyodapanaṁ —
etaṁ buddhāna sāsanaṁ.

verses.title: Dhp 168–169
verses.text:
Dhammaṁ care sucaritaṁ,
na naṁ duccaritaṁ care;
dhammacārī sukhaṁ seti,
asmiṁ loke paraṁ hi ca.

verses.title: Dhp 259
verses.text:
Na tāvatā dhammadharo,
yāvatā bahu bhāsati;
yo ca appampi sutvāna,
dhammaṁ kāyena passati,
sa ve dhammadharo hoti,
yo dhammaṁ nappamajjati.

verses.title: Jayamaṅgala — Buddha
verses.text:
N’atthi me saraṇaṁ aññaṁ,
Buddho me saraṇaṁ varaṁ;
etena saccavajjena,
hotu me jayamaṅgalaṁ.

verses.title: Jayamaṅgala — Dhamma
verses.text:
N’atthi me saraṇaṁ aññaṁ,
Dhammo me saraṇaṁ varaṁ;
etena saccavajjena,
hotu me jayamaṅgalaṁ.

verses.title: Jayamaṅgala — Saṅgha
verses.text:
N’atthi me saraṇaṁ aññaṁ,
Saṅgho me saraṇaṁ varaṁ;
etena saccavajjena,
hotu me jayamaṅgalaṁ.

verses.title: Salutations
verses.text:
Namo Buddhāya.
Namo Dhammāya.
Namo Saṅghāya.
Sādhu, sādhu, sādhu.
